item.description:
Hi Everyone...

Our NEXT Sunday brunch will be @ 1:30PM on March 29th at:

Veggie Planet (for all you vegetarians/health nuts ;)
47 Palmer St
Cambridge, MA 02138
(617) 661-1513
Price: Reasonable
www.veggieplanet.net (check them out on the web)

I hear really great things about Veggie Planet.

I'm in.... I hope to see you there!!!

Cheers,
Michael
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation will be under Mike/Meet up

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Vegetarian Brunch at Veggie Planet in Cambridge
